item.description:
In 1993, the Milani family arrived to Connecticut where they opened

a gourmet coffee shop, Coffee Island Cafe,

offering sandwiches, panini and a variety of homemade baked goods.

In 2003 they moved to North Haven and opened Milani’s Italian Bakery in the center of Northford.

Emilio comes from a long line of bakers in Italy.

He learned everything that he knows from his father Tullio Milani,

who has been in the bakery business since the 1950’s.

Trust me this Italian bakery is in the same class as Lucibello's and

Rocco's Italian Pastry Shop in New Haven.

Check out this site for more info

http://www.milanibakery.com/

www.milanibakery.com/

Suggested ending time for this Meet Up

is 6 or 6:30 pm

FYI-It  MILANI'S CLOSES AT 7PM!

For directions either click on their address here and

Click on directions or go to their website.
item.name: Coffee and Pastry at Milani's Italian Bakery
